blogPost.title: Can employers ask for proof of vaccination? Answer by Kara Govro, Senior HR Law Analyst. https://t.co/RgwcH7Weu8 https://t.co/y9fo7SqrEL
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 雇用主は予防接種の証明を求めることができますか？回答者：Kara Govro, Senior HR Law Analyst. https://t.co/RgwcH7Weu8 https://t.co/y9fo7SqrEL
雇主可以要求提供疫苗接种证明吗？回答者：Kara Govro，高级人力资源法律分析师。https://t.co/RgwcH7Weu8 https://t.co/y9fo7SqrEL
僱主可以要求提供疫苗接種證明嗎？回答者：Kara Govro，高級人力資源法律分析師。https://t.co/RgwcH7Weu8 https://t.co/y9fo7SqrEL

previous.title: How is blackness represented in various digital domains? Answer by André Brock, author of Distributed Blackness. https://t.co/BDvviagm4e https://t.co/CBexNbHCgT

localize.full_text: 様々なデジタル領域で、黒さはどのように表現されるのか？Distributed Blackness』の著者であるAndré Brock氏による回答。https://t.co/BDvviagm4e https://t.co/CBexNbHCgT
黑人在各种数字领域是如何表现的？回答者：André Brock，《分布式黑》的作者。https://t.co/BDvviagm4e https://t.co/CBexNbHCgT
黑人在各種數字領域是如何表現的？回答者：André Brock，《分佈式黑》的作者。https://t.co/BDvviagm4e https://t.co/CBexNbHCgT

next.title: Can you share a surprising fact you found working with DoorDash data? Answer by Raghav Ramesh, Machine Learning Engineer @DoorDash. https://t.co/F5yan2Bw1V https://t.co/7fVFrfqzgl

localize.full_text: あなたがDoorDashのデータを使って見つけた驚くべき事実を教えてください。Answer by Raghav Ramesh, Machine Learning Engineer @DoorDash. https://t.co/F5yan2Bw1V https://t.co/7fVFrfqzgl
您能分享一下您在使用DoorDash数据时发现的一个令人惊讶的事实吗？回答者：Raghav Ramesh, 机器学习工程师 @DoorDash. https://t.co/F5yan2Bw1V https://t.co/7fVFrfqzgl
您能分享一下您在使用DoorDash數據時發現的一個令人驚訝的事實嗎？回答者：Raghav Ramesh, 機器學習工程師 @DoorDash. https://t.co/F5yan2Bw1V https://t.co/7fVFrfqzgl
